class.name: com.simplysoftware.QuartzScheduler.QuartzScheduler
class.event: JobError (JobName As String, Error As String)
JobExecute (JobName As String, Data As Map)

method.name: JobExists
method.comment: Checks whether a job with the given name exists in any group. jobName is the Job name. Returns true if the job exists, false otherwise.

method.name: PauseJob
method.comment: Pauses a job by name in any group. jobName is the Job name.

method.name: GetLog
method.comment: Returns the full internal log of the scheduler. Returns a List of strings.

method.name: Start
method.comment: Start scheduler synchronously. Blocks until scheduler.start() returns.

method.name: ListGroups
method.comment: Returns all job groups currently registered in the scheduler. Returns A List of group names.

method.name: DeleteGroup
method.comment: Deletes all jobs in a given group. groupName is the Group name.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialise synchronously. Uses RAMJobStore. eventName is the Event name prefix (e.g., "qs").

method.name: SetJobChain
method.comment: Define a simple chain of jobs: JobNames(0) -> JobNames(1) -> JobNames(2) ... When one finishes successfully, the next is triggered. jobNames is the List of job names in execution order.

method.name: ScheduleRepeatingJob
method.comment: Schedule a repeating job synchronously (default group). jobName is the Job name. intervalSeconds is the Interval in seconds. repeatCount Number of repeats (<= 0 => forever). data is the Map data.

method.name: ResumeGroup
method.comment: Resumes all jobs in a given group. groupName is the Group name.

method.name: ScheduleJobAsync
method.comment: Schedule job asynchronously on background thread (default group). jobName is the Job name. cronOrNull is the Cron expression or null. intervalSeconds is the Interval seconds for repeating (ignored if cron provided). repeatCount is the Repeat count for repeating (ignored if cron provided). data is the Map data.

method.name: GetJobData
method.comment: Retrieves the Map of data associated with a job. jobName is the Job name. Returns a Map of job data (empty if job not found).

method.name: CancelJob
method.comment: Alias for DeleteJob. jobName is the Job name.

method.name: DeleteJob
method.comment: Deletes a job by name in any group. jobName is the Job name.

method.name: ClearLog
method.comment: Clears internal log entries.

method.name: ScheduleJobAsync2
method.comment: Schedule job asynchronously on background thread with group. jobName is the Job name. groupName is the Group name. cronOrNull is the Cron expression or null. intervalSeconds is the Interval seconds for repeating (ignored if cron provided). repeatCount is the Repeat count for repeating (ignored if cron provided). data is the Map data.

method.name: PauseGroup
method.comment: Pauses all jobs in a given group. groupName is the Group name.

method.name: GetJobDetailInfo
method.comment: Returns basic job detail metadata as Map: Name, Group, Description. jobName is the Job name. Returns a Map with keys "Name", "Group", "Description" (empty if job not found).

method.name: GetJobLog
method.comment: Returns logs related to a specific job name. jobName is the Job name. Returns a List of strings.

method.name: ScheduleRepeatingJob2
method.comment: Schedule a repeating job synchronously with group. jobName is the Job name. groupName is the Group name. intervalSeconds is the Interval in seconds. repeatCount is the Number of repeats (<= 0 => forever). data is the Map data.

method.name: GetTriggerInfo
method.comment: Returns detailed trigger information for a specific job. Each item in the returned list is a Map containing trigger metadata. jobName is the job name. Returns A List of Maps describing the job's triggers.

method.name: ShutdownAsync
method.comment: Shutdown scheduler on background thread. Returns immediately.

method.name: Shutdown
method.comment: Shutdown scheduler synchronously. Waits for running jobs to complete.

method.name: ResumeJob
method.comment: Resumes a previously paused job by name in any group. jobName is the Job name.

method.name: ScheduleCronJob
method.comment: Schedule a cron job synchronously (default group). jobName is the Job name (unique). cron is the Cron expression. data is the Map of data to pass to job (can be null).

method.name: RunJobNow
method.comment: Triggers a job to run immediately, searching all groups for the job name. jobName is the Job name.

method.name: StartAsync
method.comment: Start scheduler on background thread. Returns immediately.

method.name: ScheduleCronJob2
method.comment: Schedule a cron job synchronously with group. jobName is the Job name. groupName is the Group name. cron is the Cron expression. data is the Map data.

method.name: GetNextRunTime
method.comment: Returns the next scheduled execution time for a job. jobName is the Job name. Returns Next run time in milliseconds (0 if not found or no upcoming run).

method.name: GetJobState
method.comment:
Returns the current state of a job.
Possible values: SCHEDULED PAUSED RUNNING COMPLETE NOT_FOUND
jobName The job name. Returns State string.

method.name: InitializeAsync
method.comment: Initialise asynchronously (wrapper entry point). Uses RAMJobStore. eventName is the Event name prefix (e.g., "qs").

method.name: InterruptJob
method.comment: Requests interruption of a running job (if it implements InterruptableJob). jobName is the Job name.

method.name: ListJobs
method.comment: Returns a List of job names currently known to the scheduler.
